title: El Camino Real de Tierra Adentro National Historic Trail: Comprehensive Management Plan
body: Comprehensive Management Plan         Cover of El Camino Real de Tierra Adentro NHT Comprehensive Management Plan/Final EIS NPS Photo  The Bureau of Land Management and National Park Service completed a Comprehensive Management Plan/Final Environmental Impact Statement for El Camino Real de Tierra Adentro National Historic Trail in April 2004. You can open, read, or download the plan in sections, which are available here in PDF Cover Vision Abstract Title and Executive Summary Contents and Chapter 1 Purpose/Process/Issues Chapter 2 Alternatives Map 3A 1 of 7 Auto Tour Route Map 3B 2 of 7 Auto Tour Route Map 3C 3 of 7 Auto Tour Route Map 3D 4 of 7 Auto Tour Route Map 3E 5 of 7 Auto Tour Route Map 3F 6 of 7 Auto Tour Route Map 3G 7 of 7 Auto Tour Route Chapter 3 Existing Environment Chapter 4 Environmental Consequences Chapter 5 Consultation/Coordination Chapter 5 Agency Letters Appendix A Establishment Act Appendix B National Trails System Act Appendix C Administrative Responsibility Appendix D Community Meeting Results Appendixes E and F High Potential Sites and Route Segments Appendix G Trail Marking and Signs Appendix H Visual Resource Management Classes/Objectives Appendix I Certification Agreements Appendix J Comments and Responses Glossary Bibliography End of Document and Document Number Map Supplement Maps 1S - 7S Maps 8S - 15S Maps 16S - 20S Maps 21S - 27S
